description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=0/3. Planet Panic! is a fun and frantic game of over-the-top space combat. With an arsenal of bizzare and deadly weapons at your grasp.    Fight for domination of your solar system by exploiting the gravity of neighbouring planets to destroy your friends!  Planet Panic! is played in real-time with 2-4 players.  Planet Panic! was a runner-up in the 2008 Dare to be Digital competition.
